dmca.title: Foner Books: we said "Print on Demand," not Copy our Text
dmca.body:
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

DMCA Notification for Web Search

1.The copyrighted material being infringed upon is from the published book, "Print-on-Demand Book Publishing" ISBN#0972380132 by Morris Rosenthal and excerpts on our website www.fonerbooks.com. The copyright office registration for the book is TX-S-979-594, registered 3 May2004.

2.The Infringing material consists on ten individual pages on the Lovepublishers.com website. Nine of these pages are listed on their sitemap, one is listed exclusively on the homepage, two others are listed both places, all with under the following titles:

You Found Your Publisher
A Lightning Source Book Example
Amazon Rank Equals Book Promotion and Marketing
Designing for Online Sales
How to Edit and Proofread a Manuscript 
Publish What You Know You Can Sell
How to Design a Book in Word and Convert to PDF
How to market your book online 
Getting people to come to your site 
Your Future with Love Publishers


Search Query : "publish what you know you can sell"
Infringing Web Page:
www.lovepublishers.com/main/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=18&Itemid=32
Search Query: "rather than simply presenting my conclusions"
Infringing Web Pages:
www.lovepublishers.com/main/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&1d=21&Itemid=32
Search Query: "maybe you secretly hate your computer"
Infringing Web Page:
www.lovepublishers.com/train/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=22&Itemid=32
Search Query: "Imagine sending a query letter"
Infringing Web Page:
www.lovepublishers.com/selfpublish/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=13&Itemid=32 
Search Query. "Foner Books also chose"
Infringing Web Page:
www.lovepublishers.com/main/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=24&Itemid=32
Search Query: "complicated book straight out of Word"
Infringing Web Page:
www.lovepublishers.com/selfpublish/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=19&Itemid=32 
Search Query: "A technical edit is somewhat"
Infringing Web Page
www.lovepublishers.com/selfpublish/Index.php?option=com_content&task=view&Id=l6&Itemid=32
Search Query: "Once very different beasts"
Infringing Web Page
www.lovepublishers.com/selfpublish/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=23&Itemid=32
Search Query: "Binding obviously contributes" 
Infringing Web Page
www.lovepublishers.com/main/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&Id=14&Itemid=32

Note: the following infringing page no longer comes up in Google Search, thanks to a duplicate content complaint I filed through the Spam Reports earlier:
www.lovepublishers.com/selfpublish/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=17&Itemid=32


3.My contact info
